column5: Hi all, kids at school, evenings drawing in……..less time for boat outings.  So….i hit the shores as I walk the pup.  The bite has been hot the last couple of weeks.  Slip bobber has been deadly as has the jig.  Here are some videos from the last 2 weeks of 'walking the dog'
Simon, I used to be jealous of Jack, living in that little bit of paradise... now I find myself envious of the dog. Thanks for making my day! HH

I'm pretty envious of that dog as well.  lol.  Great videos as always, Roloff is having the time of his life out there with you.  Really cool seeing the pike taking your walleye and not just once either!   Instead of a flyin trip Joe, maybe we should just camp on Simon's front lawn.
Done! Don't worry Simon, we'll walk the dog. HH
Done! Don't worry Simon, we'll walk the dog. HH deal.
Nice to be surrounded by water as you are. Thanks for sharing.
My god dude i would not leave my house if my backyard was that for a playground!!!  Puts a whole new meaning to being put in the dog house. Enjoy my  friend !!!
